alert.note: Alert for Great Salt Lake Desert and Mountains; Tooele and Rush Valleys (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 03 at 11:00AM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Tooele County through 1130 AM MDT... At 1059 AM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Grantsville, moving northeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Tooele, Grantsville, Stansbury Park, Tooele Army Depot, Erda and Lake Point. This includes Interstate 80 in Utah between mile markers 83 and 95. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...<40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Great Salt Lake Desert and Mountains; Tooele and Rush Valleys
